code: import axios from"axios";export var getList=function getList(){return axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/tasks",{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}}).then(function(res){return res.data;});};export var addToList=function addToList(term){return axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/task",{title:term,isDone:false},{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}}).then(function(response){console.log(response);});};export var deleteItem=function deleteItem(term){axios.delete("http://localhost:5000/api/task/".concat(term),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}}).then(function(response){console.log(response);}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};export var updateItem=function updateItem(term,id){return axios.put("http://localhost:5000/api/task/".concat(id),{title:term,isDone:false},{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}}).then(function(response){console.log(response);});};
